definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

thigh/part of a whole/portion of a sum/(stock) share/strand of a thread/low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below 科[ke1]/classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc/classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff/classifier for bands of people, gangs etc/classifier for sudden forceful actions

containing_words.word: 上海证券交易所综合股价指

sentences.english: This simple analysis holds only for two-ply yarns.
sentences.chinese: 这些简单的分析只适合于由两根单纱合股成的纱线。

sentences.english: Soon I may make you my partner in the Neptune.
sentences.chinese: 不久我可能要你当我内普丘恩的合股人。
他们解散了该合股公司。

sentences.english: He found his partner to be very disagreeable.
sentences.chinese: 他发现这位合股人很难相处。

sentences.english: The profits were divided between two partners.
sentences.chinese: 利润由两位合股人分得。

sentences.english: There are three partners in this firm of lawyers.
sentences.chinese: 这家律师事务所由三人合股。

definition: to act jointly/to form a partnership
money farm (dealing in illegal foreign currency of money laundering)
to speculate/to play the market/(fig.) to sell hot air/to swindle people by posing as a reputable operator
private loan association where money is allocated through bidding/meeting of such an association/to win the bidding at such a meeting
to buy and sell/to do business/to trade/to deal
